name: Remnants Of The Witch
description:
An RPGMaker game about Mari Zima joining a witch-hunting organization.

Follow Mari in a modern fantasy setting as you find out more about the world and its characters as Mari tries to save her friend from the witch Asrelda.

This game is not completed yet so I would highly appreciate feedback!

Font credit: https://www.dafont.com/linux-libertine.font

Patreon link: https://www.patreon.com/JeuneDanielSoleil
